Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允許將 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制網頁瀏覽器控制項能夠在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 應用程式中執行。 controls the ability of a Web browser control to run in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application. 允許宣告的範圍取決於用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊會儲存屬性目標的中繼資料，並在執行階段存取系統。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 命令式安全性，使用對應的權限類別， 。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class, . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 這個類別不通常用於 XAML。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何要求呼叫的程式碼具有無限制的權限來建立網頁瀏覽器控制項。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted permission to create a Web browser control. [!code-csharp[WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets#WebBrowserPermissionAttribute3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#webbrowserpermissionattribute3)] [!code-vb[WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets#WebBrowserPermissionAttribute3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#webbrowserpermissionattribute3)]

summary.span: 建立並傳回 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.
A corresponding to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由安全性系統，不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫方法。The method is called by the security system, not by application code. 所描述的安全性資訊會儲存在中繼資料的屬性，這個目標是要類別套用。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系統會存取在執行階段資訊。The system accesses the information at run time. 系統會使用所傳回若要將屬性目標的安全性資訊轉換成可序列化的形式儲存在中繼資料。The system uses the returned by to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 這個類別的成員不常使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
